metadata.title: CVE-2023-38321 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: OpenNDS, as used in Sierra Wireless ALEOS before 4.17.0.12 and otherproducts, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference, daemon crash, and Captive Portal outage) via a GETrequest to /opennds_auth/ that lacks a custom query string parameter andclient-token.

criterions.comment: opennds package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
